name: Kisekae Series 3: Kisekae Hamster
summary: The Kisekae series following "Kisekae Monogatari" and "Fashionable Diary". In the game, I go to a ham school to study and challenge a vocational exam. If you pass the desired occupation, you can get clothes suitable for that occupation. There are more than 100,000 combinations of coordination, more than 10 times the previous work! Moreover, boy characters can also be played. You can also strengthen the communication function to make friends' characters appear and enjoy e-mails and bulletin boards. Personality fortune-telling is classified into 64 patterns, so the probability of hitting it may be high!
